org.opends.testqa.monitoringclient
Class ErrorsBuffer

java.lang.Object
  org.opends.testqa.monitoringclient.ErrorsBuffer

public class ErrorsBuffer
extends java.lang.Object

Buffer to store the errors who occured while the monitoring client is running.
